Attributes.description: The role of geophysical events, human ecology, environmental perception, world social and political order in explaining the risk of natural disasters. Assessment of acceptable risk, disaster relief and reconstruction and contrasts between developed and developing nations.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of GEOB 102, GEOS 102 and one of GEOB 103, GEOS 103.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Wed, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 17:00, Building: Geography, Room: 200
